overview: The Carpenters concert from May 24th, 1972 in Melbourne that aired on The Seven Network in Australia.  The songs performed are Help,  Love Is Surrender, Ticket To Ride,  For All We Know,  Close To You,  Cinderella Rockefella,  Superstar,  Medley (Any Day Now, Baby It's You, Knowing When To Leave, Make It Easy On Yourself, There's Always Something There To Remind Me, Walk On By, Do You Know The Way To San Jose?),  Hurting Each Other,  We've Only Just Begun.
title: The Carpenters: Live in Australia
